com.koushikdutta.async.http

接口 AsyncHttpClientMiddleware

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AsyncSocketMiddleware, AsyncSSLSocketMiddleware, HttpTransportMiddleware, ResponseCacheMiddleware, SimpleMiddleware, SpdyMiddleware

    public interface AsyncHttpClientMiddleware
    AsyncHttpClientMiddleware is used by AsyncHttpClient to inspect, manipulate, and handle http requests.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.GetSocketData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnBodyDataOnRequestSentData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnExchangeHeaderData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnHeadersReceivedDataOnRequestSentData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnRequestData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnRequestSentData 
      static class  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnResponseCompleteDataOnRequestSentData 
      static interface  AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.ResponseHead 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean exchangeHeaders(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnExchangeHeaderData data)
      Called before when the headers are sent and received via the socket.
      Cancellable getSocket(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.GetSocketData data)
      Called to retrieve the socket that will fulfill this request
      void onBodyDecoder(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnBodyDataOnRequestSentData data)
      Called before the body is decoded
      void onHeadersReceived(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnHeadersReceivedDataOnRequestSentData data)
      Called once the headers have been received via the socket
      void onRequest(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnRequestData data)
      Called immediately upon request execution
      void onRequestSent(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnRequestSentData data)
      Called once the headers and any optional request body has been sent
      void onResponseComplete(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnResponseCompleteDataOnRequestSentData data)
      Called once the request is complete and response has been received, or if an error occurred

      • exchangeHeaders

        boolean exchangeHeaders(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnExchangeHeaderData data)
        Called before when the headers are sent and received via the socket. Implementers return true to denote they will manage header exchange.
        参数:
        data -
        返回:

        Called once the headers and any optional request body has been sent
